titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for registring of knights
Proclamations. 1623-04-25
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Windsor the fiue and twentieth day of April, in the one and twentieth yeere of our reigne ..
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
